atk-s0401a9:1_2: Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ nisinnā kumbhaghosakaṁ ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appayasaṁ appaparivāraṁ ahosi, idāni mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ jāta’’nti kathayiṁsu.
atk-s0401a9:1_3: Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a9:2_0: 82. Dutiyādīsu mahato anatthāyāti mahantassa anatthassa atthāya. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
